content: now panel knit to 2 sts before raglan marker kfb k1 appears as 2 loops over the needle and you are sm kfb knit to 2 sts before raglan marker kfb ready to purl k1 sm twice 8 sts increase - 2 sts per section double the stitch on rs bring the yarn between work rounds 3-4 a total of 2 2 4 6 6 6 times the needle tips to the rs then slip 1 stitch this is 4 4 8 12 12 12 rounds purlwise pass the yarn over the needle to the 364 396 432 464 492 524 total sts ws this doubled stitch now appears as 2 loops 76 82 88 94 98 102 sts at each sleeve over the needle and you are ready to knit 106 116 128 138 148 160 sts at each front and back flax sweater dk facebook-square instagram ravelry pinterest envelope www tincanknits com 5 the bor marker is currently located at the back body right shoulder just before the right sleeve on the following round you will place the cb marker work in stockinette until body measures around which the short row are worked regular length 5 5 5 6 6 5 8 5 11 5 13 5 underarm or 1 1 1 1 5 1 5 1 5 1 5 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 short row 1 rs k30 35 38 42 44 48 54 58 61 2 short of desired length 65 69 72 77 84 92 100 110 117 125 turn work regular and cropped lengths change to smaller short row 2 ws double the stitch purl to cb needles and work in 1x1 ribbing for 1 1 1 1 5 sm p30 35 38 42 44 48 54 58 61 65 69 72 1 5 1 5 1 5 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 bind off 77 84
